# wirk force ≈ vir <> fire

𐛧 𐙇𐘾 KA guerre <> vir

𒆜 𒄒 𒆙 𒉫 𒌩 力 lìrum •l'virum "force" ( KASKAL GIŠ%GIŠ KAL%KAL Kraft )

𒌷 ᵛURU vir 𒍇𒊒 u₁₈-ru 𒋀𒀊 uru₁₅ 𒂗 urunₓ wehrhaft viral "exalted; strong"

𓋹 pro > vir bio vita <> wind

wir ⋍ man ⇔ wǒ:mén 我门

𓅱 𓇋 𓀀, 𓇋, 𓍢 𓇋 , 𓏌 𓎡 𓍢

𓅷 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓂺 𓀀 | male, man | parai.sen ἄρσην ᵖársēn पुरुष puruṣa > vyriškas vyrų > vir

𒀀𒉿𒇻𒌅 a-wi-lu-tu •a'viraty humanity (Lamm<ram) •viramtion ⇔ virality

¬lirum = delirium dē- “out of” + līra “track, rut” 𒆜 ☑

men = vir <> warrior 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓂋 𓏏 𓇛 | band (for arm or ankle) | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓄿 𓏏 𓀀 𓏥 | trained soldiers, assult troops, infantry, soldiers | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓄿 𓏏 𓀎 𓏪 | trained soldiers, assult troops, infantry, soldiery | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀘 𓏪 | trained soldiers, assult troops, infantry, soldiers | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓇋 𓏏 𓇋 𓀎 𓏪 | trained soldiers, assult troops, infantry, soldiers | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓏏 𓀀 𓏪 | trained soldiers, assault troops, infantry, soldiery | 𓏠 𓈖 𓆑 𓏏 𓀙 𓏪 | minsnthier➙(m)infntrie trained soldiers, assault troops, infantry |
